ThingDef.label: persona charge pistol
ThingDef.description:
A charged-shot pistol. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.

This three round burst pistol is a very effective sidearm deployed across all regiments of imperial commandos.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona charge shotgun
ThingDef.description:
A charged-shot slug thrower. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.

Deadly in close range, this shotgun has been banned by the imperial military for inflicting unmeasurable pain.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

Fires rapidly but requires to close the distance between the target.

ThingDef.label: persona charge sniper rifle
ThingDef.description:
A charged-shot triple barreled sniper rifle. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.

Due to three separate barrels firing simultaneously, weapon power is reduced and rate of fire is decreased.
